title: Newsrooms become talent hubs for vertical video journalists
description: From Instagram Reels to TikTok, one pattern stands out: People follow people, not “the newsroom” as an abstract idea. Recommendation systems amplify this because they are designed to surface the consistent creator identities audiences already gravitate towards. Younger audiences behave this way most strongly, but they’re not alone. Vertical video has quietly become a cross-generational...
